text: I suppose it would be appropriate to say it was a foregone conclusionー
The battle with Gaiza was an overwhelming victory for me.

name: Gaiza
text: Guaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhh!!!
Gaiza did a somersault as he went flying through the air.
Don't get me wrong, Gaiza was not weak. On the contraryー
As you would expect of one of the Fuma Clan's prominent members, the leader the Nisha Clan, his strength was not run of the mill.
He was undoubtedly one of the best fighters in the academy.
However, he had picked the wrong opponent.
My Ninja Art was the power to govern the cause and effect of all thingsー
Before my "Evil Eye of the Conqueror," even Gaiza was on the level of a newborn.

name: Gaiza
text: Damn it!! You're too strong!! What strength, you bastard!!!
Gaiza punched the ground in frustration.
The students who had been watching our battle also called out, offering words of praise like "Amazing!!" and "That's our president!!

name: Me
text: Are you hurt, Gaiza?

name: Gaiza
text: Damn it... don't take pity on me!!
*Smack!!*
The hand I had extended to Gaiza was slapped aside.
He didn't need me to feel sorry for himーHe was a proud man, despite his crude language and behavior.
Finally, after standing up on his own, Gaiza sent a pleasant smile my way.

name: Gaiza
text: I'm convinced, Fuma Kotaro!! It's vexing, butーI've been thoroughly bested!!

name: Gaiza
text: In the end, there's no other Clan Head but you!! Lead us onward, now and always!!
And he vigorously held out his right hand.

name: Me
text: Hm. I guess I have no choice...
I, too, offered my right hand and exchanged a firm handshake with Gaiza.
ーOoooooooooooooooohhhhhhhhh!!
A massive round of applause and raucous cheers erupted from the students surrounding us.
It was a little embarrassing, but I guess this was what it meant to be young.
Everyone around us was totally mesmerized by the spectacle of our intense friendship.

name: Me
text: (Sheesh... I'm standing out again.)

name: Me
text: (Oh well, I guess it can't be helped. Because I'm not the same person I was back then when everyone called me Diot......... hm?)

name: Me
text: (ーーーー"Diot"?)
*Thump-thump!!*

name: Me
text: Ugh!?
A sharp pain shot through my right eye.

name: Me
text: (No, wait a second...!!? What's going on!? Something is weird!?)
An intense feeling of discomfort welled up inside meー
I was assailed by the sensation that the cheers around me were quickly fading away.

name: Me
text: (This is weird... way too weird...!!!)
ーThe allowance of a million yen in my pocket.
But wasn't the real me always suffering in poverty from Tokiko's strict management of my allowance?
ーThe generous praise and admiration from the other students.
But wasn't the real me branded as the "useless head of the Fuma Clan" and treated as an outcast in the academy?
And of course, there was no way I could be in such an indulgent relationship with Tokikoー

name: Me
text: (Ughh!? What the hell is going on...!?)
Accompanied by the intense pain in my right eye, those out-of-place memories where being rewritten one by one.

name: Me
text: No, guys... hold on...?
I didn't know what exactly was going on, but one thing was clear: "Something was strange."
And as I raised my head to call out to somebody and ask...

name: Asuka
text: Hey, not bad. Looks like you realized on your own.

name: Me
text: Youー!?
As I turned to look at the familiar-sounding voiceー

name: Asuka
text: Hehe, it's been a while. How have you been?
It was Asukaーthe "steel woman"ーI had encountered before during a previous mission.
